alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued November 21 at 3:07PM EST until November 22 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Statement, isolated minor coastal flooding. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Coastal Palm Beach and Coastal Broward Counties. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Statement, around the times of high tide through at least late Tuesday night. For the High Rip Current Risk, through at least Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Coastal Palm Beach County
